alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 5:17PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL ST. JOHNS COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 517 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms producing a landspout along a line extending from near Fruit Cove to near World Golf Village to near Picolata. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fruit Cove, World Golf Village, South Ponte Vedra, Nocatee, Durbin, Switzerland, Guana River State Park, and South Ponte Vedra Beach. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
